text: Yara binimaye tara tadera nijedera ke bikri kareche ta kata'i na nikrsta! Ta hacche, allahâ€Œ ya nayila karechena, tara tara sathe kuphari kareche, hatakaritabasata, sudhu ejan'ya ye, allahâ€Œ tamra bandadera madhye yara prati iccha sbiya anugraha nayila karena. Kaje'i tara krodhera upara krodha arjana kareche [1]. Ara kaphiradera jan'ya rayeche lanchanamaya sasti
